class.name: VisualShaderNodeUIntFunc
class.brief_description: An unsigned scalar integer function to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Accept an unsigned integer scalar ([code]x[/code]) to the input port and transform it according to [member function].

members.member: A function to be applied to the scalar. See [enum Function] for options.

constants.constant: Returns the result of bitwise [code]NOT[/code] operation on the integer. Translates to [code]~a[/code] in the Godot Shader Language.
Represents the size of the [enum Function] enum.
